description: Skill catalog for Claude Code Harness. Skills are reusable patterns/workflows.

schema.name: string - unique identifier (kebab-case)
schema.triggers: string[] - keywords/phrases that activate this skill
schema.path: string - relative path to SKILL.md file
schema.tools_used: string[] - tools this skill typically uses
schema.last_used: string - ISO date of last use

example_skill.name: test-driven-development
example_skill.description: Write tests first, then implementation to pass tests
